Method Detail

apply

public static final OWLList<Atom> apply(OWLList<Atom> atoms,
                                        ValueMap<?,?> binding,
                                        SWRLFactory.ISWRLFactory swrlFactory)
Apply the given values possibly binding some of the unbound variables in Atoms of the given list to concrete values.

Note that new atom instances will be created in the backing OWLModel of the SWRL factory, which may be not the same as the one to which the given atoms in the list are attached to.

Parameters:
atoms - The list of (partially) unbound atoms.
binding - The map of values, each bound to a variable.
swrlFactory - Factory which will be used to instantiate bound Atoms to be added to the result list.
Returns:
A list containing the same types of atoms as in the given list, whereby unbound variables of each atom are replaced by a concrete value as retrieved from the given value map. Atoms with unbound variables which could not be bound (because a value does not exist in the given binding) remain unbound in the result.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If one of the parameters is null.

getVars

public static final <V extends Variable> java.util.List<V> getVars(OWLList<Atom> atoms,
                                                                   java.lang.Class<V> varType)
Return all the variables mentioned in the given list of atoms and which can be viewed as the given variable type.

Returns:
List of Variable objects
